content.description: An object is moving in the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> direction as shown in the graph. At time <math alttext="t equals t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, the motion changes. Which of the following describes the velocity <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> before and acceleration <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math> after <math alttext="t equals t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>?
content.question: Velocity before <math alttext="t equals t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>Acceleration after <math alttext="t equals t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>AZeroPositiveBPositiveNegativeCPositivePositiveDNegativePositiveEPositiveZero

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
